data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to collect information at close-out about e.g. diabetes management, adherence to treatment plan, diabetes-related complications, usage of (non-diabetes) medications, general physical and lifestyle measurements (e.g. height, weight, smoking, exercise), medical history of volunteer and family, and socio-economic information (used December '92 to April '93).

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: OCLSTVST
variable.description: Date of last completed visit

variable.name: OCDV1A1
variable.description: Date of deviation termination

variable.name: OCDV1A2
variable.description: Date of form f022 completion

variable.name: OCIS1A1
variable.description: Date of return to active status

variable.name: OCIS1A2
variable.description: Date of form f016

variable.name: OCMDT1B1
variable.description: Date permit received to modify regimen

variable.name: OCMDT1B2
variable.description: Date new treatment regimen started

variable.name: OCMDT1C1
variable.description: Date patient returned to regimen of 1 to 2 daily injections

variable.name: OCMDT2C3
variable.description: Experimental group: date new therapy goals became effective

variable.name: OCMDTRET
variable.description: Experimental group: date patient returned to goals of experimental group

variable.name: OCDC3C2
variable.description: Date of last menstrual period

variable.name: OCPEDATE
variable.description: Date of last physical examination

variable.name: OCBLPDAT
variable.description: Date of second sitting blood pressure

variable.name: OCCOLDAT
variable.description: Date Profileset has been collected

variable.name: OCPRFDAT
variable.description: Date Profileset has been mailed

variable.name: OCHBDATE
variable.description: Date HbA1c specimens were collected

variable.name: OCLPDATE
variable.description: Date lipid specimens were drawn

variable.name: OCRENDAT
variable.description: Date renal specimens were collected

variable.name: OCNA2E
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - standard group: failed to perform at least two urine or one self blood glucose monitoring per day

variable.name: OCMRDATE
variable.description: Date marital status changed

variable.name: OCSMOKE8
variable.description: Number of pipefuls/cigars per week patient smoked (on average) in past year

variable.name: OCTOTUNT
variable.description: Total number of insulin units/day

variable.name: OCEXER2
variable.description: Exercise: hours and minutes of light activity

variable.name: OCEXER3
variable.description: Exercise: hours and minutes of moderate activity

variable.name: OCEXER4
variable.description: Exercise: hours and minutes of hard activity

variable.name: OCEXER5
variable.description: Exercise: hours and minutes of very hard activity

variable.name: OCDM3BRD
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) done before breakfast

variable.name: OCDM3BRS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) should have done before breakfast

variable.name: OCDM3LUD
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) done before lunch

variable.name: OCDM3LUS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) should have done before lunch

variable.name: OCDM3DID
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) done before dinner

variable.name: OCDM3DIS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) should have done before dinner

variable.name: OCDM3BED
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) done before bedtime

variable.name: OCDM3BES
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) should have done before bedtime

variable.name: OCDM33AD
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) done at three a.m.

variable.name: OCDM33AS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (three or more daily injections or infusion pump): blood test(s) should have done at three a.m.

variable.name: OCDM1UBD
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): urine test(s) done before breakfast

variable.name: OCDM1UBS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): urine test(s) should have done before breakfast

variable.name: OCDM1BBD
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): blood test(s) done before breakfast

variable.name: OCDM1BBS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): blood test(s) should have done before breakfast

variable.name: OCDM1ULD
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): urine test(s) done before lunch

variable.name: OCDM1ULS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): urine test(s) should have done before lunch

variable.name: OCDM1BLD
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): blood test(s) done before lunch

variable.name: OCDM1BLS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): blood test(s) should have done before lunch

variable.name: OCDM1UDD
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): urine test(s) done before dinner

variable.name: OCDM1UDS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): urine test(s) should have done before dinner

variable.name: OCDM1BDD
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): blood test(s) done before dinner

variable.name: OCDM1BDS
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): blood test(s) should have done before dinner

variable.name: OCDM1UED
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): urine test(s) done before bedtime

variable.name: OCDM1UES
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): urine test(s) should have done before bedtime

variable.name: OCDM1BED
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): blood test(s) done before bedtime

variable.name: OCDM1BES
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring (one or two daily injection[s]): blood test(s) should have done before bedtime

variable.name: OCRX1
variable.description: Medications: average number of aspirin - containing (or other prostaglandin inhibiting) tablets per month (000=none)

variable.name: OCPULSE
variable.description: Patient's pulse

variable.name: OCSYSTR
variable.description: Current blood pressure - systolic

variable.name: OCDIASR
variable.description: Current blood pressure - diastolic

variable.name: OCSYSTR2
variable.description: Second blood pressure - systolic

variable.name: OCDIASR2
variable.description: Second blood pressure - diastolic

variable.name: OCBGP8A
variable.description: On day of Profilset specimen collection - results of self blood glucose monitoring: pre-breakfast

variable.name: OCBGP8B
variable.description: On day of Profilset specimen collection - results of self blood glucose monitoring: 90 minutes pre-breakfast

variable.name: OCBGP8C
variable.description: On day of Profilset specimen collection - results of self blood glucose monitoring: pre-lunch

variable.name: OCBGP8D
variable.description: On day of Profilset specimen collection - results of self blood glucose monitoring: 90 minutes pre-lunch

variable.name: OCBGP8E
variable.description: On day of Profilset specimen collection - results of self blood glucose monitoring: pre-supper

variable.name: OCBGP8F
variable.description: On day of Profilset specimen collection - results of self blood glucose monitoring: 90 minutes pre-supper

variable.name: OCBGP8G
variable.description: On day of Profilset specimen collection - results of self blood glucose monitoring: bedtime

variable.name: OCDESIWT
variable.description: Desired weight

variable.name: OCWEIGHT
variable.description: Current weight

variable.name: OCHEIGHT
variable.description: Current height

variable.name: OCWTCHA
variable.description: Change in weight since previous exam (circle + or - to indicate 'gain' or 'loss')

variable.name: OCLAUD3
variable.description: In what part of the leg do you feel pain?

variable.name: OCRESCH
variable.description: Necessary to reschedule visit

variable.name: OCRESCHN
variable.description: Number of times it was necessary to reschedule visit

variable.name: OCVSITNO
variable.description: Follow-up visit number

variable.name: OCGENDER
variable.description: Patient's gender

variable.name: OCMARRY
variable.description: Patient's marital status

variable.name: OCMARNO
variable.description: Number of times married

variable.name: OCPATJOB
variable.description: Patient's occupation

variable.name: OCSPJOB
variable.description: Spouse's occupation

variable.name: OCMOMJOB
variable.description: Mother's occupation

variable.name: OCDADJOB
variable.description: Father's occupation

variable.name: OCFRIJOB
variable.description: Guardian's/friend's occupation

variable.name: OCPATNOJ
variable.description: Patient is unemployed or retired

variable.name: OCSPONOJ
variable.description: Spouse is unemployed or retired

variable.name: OCMOMNOJ
variable.description: Mother is unemployed or retired

variable.name: OCDADNOJ
variable.description: Father is unemployed or retired

variable.name: OCFRINOJ
variable.description: Guardian/friend unemployed or retired

variable.name: OCPJOBCH
variable.description: Patient's job status changed

variable.name: OCSJOBCH
variable.description: Spouse's job status changed

variable.name: OCMJOBCH
variable.description: Mother's job status changed

variable.name: OCDJOBCH
variable.description: Father's job status changed

variable.name: OCFJOBCH
variable.description: Guardian's/friend's job status changed

variable.name: OCPATED
variable.description: Patient's education level
variable.value: GRADUATE SCHOOL;2=COLLEGE GRADUATE;3=SOME COLLEGE OR TRADE SCHOOL;4=SECONDARY SCHOOL GRADUATE;5=SOME SECONDARY SCHOOL;6=ELEMENTARY SCHOOL;7=NONE;8=UNKNOWN

variable.name: OCSPOED
variable.description: Spouse's education level
variable.value: GRADUATE SCHOOL;2=COLLEGE GRADUATE;3=SOME COLLEGE OR TRADE SCHOOL;4=SECONDARY SCHOOL GRADUATE;5=SOME SECONDARY SCHOOL;6=ELEMENTARY SCHOOL;7=NONE;8=UNKNOWN

variable.name: OCMOMED
variable.description: Mother's education level
variable.value: GRADUATE SCHOOL;2=COLLEGE GRADUATE;3=SOME COLLEGE OR TRADE SCHOOL;4=SECONDARY SCHOOL GRADUATE;5=SOME SECONDARY SCHOOL;6=ELEMENTARY SCHOOL;7=NONE;8=UNKNOWN

variable.name: OCDADED
variable.description: Father's education level
variable.value: GRADUATE SCHOOL;2=COLLEGE GRADUATE;3=SOME COLLEGE OR TRADE SCHOOL;4=SECONDARY SCHOOL GRADUATE;5=SOME SECONDARY SCHOOL;6=ELEMENTARY SCHOOL;7=NONE;8=UNKNOWN

variable.name: OCFRIED
variable.description: Guardian's/friend's education level
variable.value: GRADUATE SCHOOL;2=COLLEGE GRADUATE;3=SOME COLLEGE OR TRADE SCHOOL;4=SECONDARY SCHOOL GRADUATE;5=SOME SECONDARY SCHOOL;6=ELEMENTARY SCHOOL;7=NONE;8=UNKNOWN

variable.name: OCSTUDNT
variable.description: Patient was student in past year

variable.name: OCGRADE
variable.description: Elementary/secondary school grade

variable.name: OCTYEAR
variable.description: Patient's number of years in trade school

variable.name: OCCYEAR
variable.description: Patient's number of years in college

variable.name: OCGYEAR
variable.description: Patient's number of years in graduate school

variable.name: OCEXPELL
variable.description: Patient ceased attending school in past year

variable.name: OCSMOKE1
variable.description: Patient smoked cigarettes/cigarillos in past year

variable.name: OCSMOKE2
variable.description: Patient currently smokes cigarettes/cigarillos

variable.name: OCSMOKE3
variable.description: How many months since patient quit smoking cigarettes/cigarillos?

variable.name: OCSMOKE4
variable.description: How many cigarettes or cigarillos/day did patient smoke in past year?

variable.name: OCSMOKE5
variable.description: Smoked pipes or cigars in past year

variable.name: OCSMOKE6
variable.description: Patient currently smokes pipes or cigars

variable.name: OCSMOKE7
variable.description: Months since patient quit smoking pipes or cigars

variable.name: OCSMOK9A
variable.description: During past 12 months has patient lived in an environment in which people smoked?

variable.name: OCSMOK9B
variable.description: During past 12 months has patient worked in an environment in which co-workers smoked?

variable.name: OCDRINK1
variable.description: Patient consumed at least one alcoholic beverage per week during last 12 months.

variable.name: OCDRINK2
variable.description: Number of bottles (12-oz) of beer consumed in last seven days

variable.name: OCDRINK3
variable.description: Number of bottles (12-oz) of light beer consumed in last seven days

variable.name: OCDRINK4
variable.description: Number of glasses of wine (4-oz) consumed in last seven days

variable.name: OCDRINK5
variable.description: Number of shot glasses of hard liquor (1.5-oz) consumed in last seven days

variable.name: OCDRINK6
variable.description: Total amount of alcohol consumed in last seven days > 560 grams

variable.name: OCDM5
variable.description: Describe insulin regimen (if different from that described in Question 4)

variable.name: OCDM6A
variable.description: Infusion pump: units of basal insulin rate/day

variable.name: OCDM6B
variable.description: Infusion pump: number of different basal rates used/day

variable.name: OCDM6C
variable.description: Infusion pump: technical problems with insulin infusion pump

variable.name: OCDM7A
variable.description: MDI - (M.D.) prescribed change in insulin regimen

variable.name: OCDM7A1
variable.description: MDI - prescribed change in insulin regimen because of: symptoms of polyuria, polydipsia

variable.name: OCDM7A2
variable.description: MDI - prescribed change in insulin regimen because of: unacceptable degree of hypoglycemia

variable.name: OCDM7A3
variable.description: MDI - prescribed change in insulin regimen because of: recurrent ketonuria

variable.name: OCDM7A4
variable.description: MDI - prescribed change in insulin regimen because of: hemoglobin a1c above limit

variable.name: OCDM7A5
variable.description: MDI - prescribed change in insulin regimen because of: pregnancy

variable.name: OCDM7A6
variable.description: MDI - prescribed change in insulin regimen because of: other symptom(s)

variable.name: OCDM7B1
variable.description: MDI - patient monitors diabetes through: self blood glucose monitoring

variable.name: OCDM7B2
variable.description: MDI - patient monitors diabetes through: urine glucose monitoring

variable.name: OCDM8
variable.description: Self blood glucose monitoring results suspected to be inaccurate or fictitious

variable.name: OCDV1
variable.description: Since last visit: deviation from treatment plan

variable.name: OCDV1A
variable.description: Currently on deviation from treatment plan

variable.name: OCIS1
variable.description: Since last visit: any time on inactive status

variable.name: OCIS1A
variable.description: Currently on transfer to inactive status

variable.name: OCMDF1
variable.description: Since last visit: any time on modified follow-up schedule

variable.name: OCMDF2
variable.description: Currently on modified follow-up schedule

variable.name: OCMDT1
variable.description: Standard treatment group - since last visit: patient has been on modified therapy at anytime

variable.name: OCMDT1A
variable.description: Standard treatment group - since last visit: patient has used glucose monitoring at greater frequency than specified in protocol

variable.name: OCMDT1A1
variable.description: Standard treatment group - since last visit: if more self blood glucose monitorings were performed than specified in protocol, how many

variable.name: OCMDT1A2
variable.description: Standard treatment group - since last visit: if more urine glucose monitorings were performed than specified in protocol, how many

variable.name: OCMDT1B
variable.description: Standard treatment group - since last visit: patient has used at any time > 2 injections insulin/day or an insulin pump

variable.name: OCMDT1C
variable.description: Standard treatment group - since last visit: patient is currently using > 2 injections insulin/day or an insulin pump

variable.name: OCMDT1D
variable.description: Standard treatment group - since last visit: there have been other modifications to therapy

variable.name: OCMDT2
variable.description: Experimental group - since last visit: patient has been on modified treatment protocol

variable.name: OCMDT2A
variable.description: Experimental group - since last visit: patient has instituted a less frequent visit schedule

variable.name: OCMDT2B
variable.description: Experimental group - since last visit: patient has been instructed to perform SBGM/day less frequently

variable.name: OCMDT2B1
variable.description: Experimental group - since last visit: less frequent SBGM/day, record how many

variable.name: OCMDT2C
variable.description: Experimental group - since last visit: patient has been instructed to use less stringent therapy goals

variable.name: OCMDT2C4
variable.description: Experimental group: new stated goals are in effect at present

variable.name: OCMDT2D
variable.description: Experimental group: other modifications - specify

variable.name: OCDM32
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring - patient uses 3 or more insulin injections/day or pump: performs more self blood glucose monitoring than prescribed

variable.name: OCDM12
variable.description: Diabetes monitoring - patient uses 1 or 2 insulin injections/day: performs more glucose monitoring than prescribed

variable.name: OCNA1A
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: how often did patient claim to follow meal plan

variable.name: OCNA1B
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: patients shows eating pattern suggestive of eating disorder

variable.name: OCNA1C1
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: number of illnesses experienced (intercurrent or not; 00=none)

variable.name: OCNA1C2
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: during how many illnesses has patient failed to adjust insulin dose as prescribed

variable.name: OCNA1D
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: used type of insulin not prescribed

variable.name: OCNA1E
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: rotated site of injection

variable.name: OCNA1F
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: completed < 7 capillary blood collections

variable.name: OCNA1G1
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: number of intercurrent events

variable.name: OCNA1G2
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: how many intercurrent events were not reported on time

variable.name: OCNA1H
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: failed to bring in daily record

variable.name: OCNA1I1
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: patient performs self blood glucose monitoring

variable.name: OCNA1I2
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: uses self blood glucose monitoring to adjust insulin dosage

variable.name: OCNA1I3
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan: performs > 1 self blood glucose monitorings

variable.name: OCNA2A
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - standard treatment group: on how many days has patient used more than prescribed units of insulin

variable.name: OCNA2B
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - standard treatment group: on how many days has patient administered extra insulin injections

variable.name: OCNA2C
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - standard treatment group: on how many days has patient administered fewer insulin injections

variable.name: OCNA2D
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - standard treatment group: on how many days has patient failed to take prescribed insulin dose

variable.name: OCNA2F1
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - standard treatment group: on how many days has patient been ill

variable.name: OCNA2F2
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - standard treatment group: on how many days has patient - because if illness - failed to test/record urine acetone levels

variable.name: OCNA3A
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - experimental treatment group: on how many days has patient failed to follow prescribed algorithm for delivery

variable.name: OCNA3B
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - experimental treatment group: how many times has patient failed to perform the prescribed 3 a.m. blood tests

variable.name: OCNA3C
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - experimental treatment group: how many times has patient failed to report a 3 a.m. low blood glucose level to clinic

variable.name: OCNA3D
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan - experimental treatment group: how many times has patient failed to monitor urine acetone levels when blood glucose was >240mg/dl or during an illness

variable.name: OCNA4A
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan/infusion pump: how many times has patient failed to follow instructions for changing batteries

variable.name: OCNA4B
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan/infusion pump: how many times has patient failed to follow instructions for changing catheters

variable.name: OCNA4C
variable.description: Non-adherence to treatment plan/infusion pump: how many times has patient failed to follow instructions for changing syringes

variable.name: OCDC1A

variable.description: Diabetes control - symptoms of hypoglycemia: during last week - how many nights did patient wake up twice (or more) to urinate

variable.description: Diabetes control - symptoms of hyperglycemia - moderate/large ketonuria days due to: spontaneous
